Organics:
 
Organics watched in wonder of Fortuneteller's craft.
"So, it's possable we can bring him back?  Can you tell how his mind is?  Is he brainwashed or something?"

Kyle Stewart <dewboy30816@...> wrote:
"All things follow a pattern, this pattern causes the
bolts to fall into place in a certain way.  From that
I can tell what is to be," she said, "Ah yes, I see
this Malice locked in a false battle as we speak, but
the true battle he has lost...but perhaps not the war,
the blackness holds his heart for the moment."

--- robert riley <bustercross365@...> wrote:
> OOC:  Malice is currently inside Unicron.  Two of
> the Minions have successfully brainwashed him... I
> think.  A tricky one, Malice.  There is a femme
> currently inside the base, named Wolfblade, who has
> great feelings for him.  But her player has
> disappeared right now.  Malice is sparing against
> the minion Blacknightmare right now.
>  
> Megatron Revived/ Organics:
>  
> Megatron Revived kneeled down to see what exactly
> Fortuneteller was doing.  He tried scanning fo
> unusual energies, but came up with nothing.
> "How does this work, I have seen many things many
> spiritual ceremonies, but never something like
> this."
>  
> Organics leaned over Fortuneteller to see what she
> is doing.  She kept her questions to herself.  
> 
> Kyle Stewart <dewboy30816@...> wrote:
> 
> "We shall see," she said, she whispered the question
> to her bolts and thew them down on the ground in
> front
> of the bot. "Their pattern will tell all...hmmm...I
> see you have a great power, it is the shadow of the
> light that was your undoing...oh, and yes, I believe
> I
> see something about Malice, but it's vague, allow me
> a
> moment."
> 
> OOC: Sorry, I thought I sent it to the group.
> Anyway,
> how is Malice?
> 
> --- "The Ultimate Archfiend of Darkness, Devouring"
> wrote:
> > Megatron Revived:
> > 
> > "Then... Do you know if Malice is okay? Tell me,
> > will Malice return 
> > to us?" the clone demanded.
> > 
> > 
> > OOC: Fortuneteller's player sent this to me
> instead
> > of the group. 
> > So here it is. 
> > 
> > Fortuneteller:
> > 
> > "I believe I may be able to asist you in your
> > battle against Unicron," said Fortuneteller, "we
> > Gypsyions have some ability to forsee what will
> be."
> > 
> > She knew she couldn't reveal the full extent of
> her
> > power, but she COULD use it to gain their
> > trust...and
> > then backstab them.
> 
> > 
> > --- In nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com, robert riley
> > 
> > wrote:
> > > OOC: Don't count Malice out yet. Right now he is
> > under Unicron's 
> > influance, capable of anything. Look to Ydrassil,
> > Windlord, perhaps 
> > Hydras or some other Pred.
> 
> 
>
